intro: Los Pingheros: A multiplayer fighting game (8 players online/local). Battle in snowy, vibrant Mexico. Knock out opponents with snow to become the ultimate Pinghero
description:
Duck, dodge and toss. Los Pingheros is a multiplayer brawler for up to 8 players online or local. 
Join hectic battles in various modes and strive to become the ultimate Pinghero in Mexico by snowing your opponents out of the arena. 
 
ULTIMATE PENGUIN SHOWDOWN 
Join an exhilarating multiplayer action for memorable frenzied battles, playable with up to 8 players online and locally. 
Dive into the vibrant colors of Mexico, draped in a unique snowy mantle, and join the action alone or with your friends.

INTENSE BRAWL MODES
Prepare yourself for thrilling and diverse confrontations across a variety of modes, where only the most cunning penguins emerge victorious: 

	• Snowball School: This mode introduces players to the game’s mechanics through timed challenges, which can be completed either solo or up to 4 players.

	• Carnaval Cup: A chaotic mode where the rules change every round! It’s a wild mix of different game modes (details below). First to reach 12 Sols takes the cup!

	• Skill Storm: Power up your Pinghero with extra skills between rounds, ramping up the action and strategy with every battle!

	• Custom: Pick your rules, choose your maps, and create your own perfect showdown!

Secret Penguin Techniques - Access to the penguin's top survival tricks: the ultimate slide, the renowned penguin spinning top, and the celebrated "Made in Penguin" chokeslam, where your opponent definitely won't be pretending. 

Outsmart Your Opponents - Destroy the cacti to uncover power-ups. Be smart on how you use them! Keep an eye on the luchador mask that enrages your penguin, and game-changing items like the magic snowflake to freeze all other penguins to the bone.

The Mexican Dressing Room - Customize your penguins to reflect your unique style. As you progress, you unlock new clothing, hats, and color palettes. 

You are not alone - Watch out for your webbed feet ! In Mexico, you won't be alone. Slide in the wrong place and you might get bitten. 

Los Pingheros in a nutshell:
	• Up to 8 players local, online, or mixed
	• Play free for all or team with friends
	• Unique Snowy Mexican setting
	• Loads of power-ups and game modes
	• Cooperative Challenge mode
	• Destruct and construct the environment
	• Customize your Penguin and unlock even more as you progress!
